availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Washington Marshall (Lyon County, Kentucky, schoolteacher)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, schoolteacher. Lyon County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Marshall and Martha Marshall. Married to Virginia Graves Marshall in Livingston County, Kentucky, on February 25, 1865. Schoolteacher in Eddyville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 764.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Driskill, p. 191B-192A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Livingston County Marriages, Film #000318176, p. 215.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994045, Lee, Leslie, Letcher, Lewis, Lincoln, Livingston County Deaths, p. 645 of 659 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com.
